name: Harvest
additionalNotes:
HARVEST 



aka: Harvest #2



An earthy CT creation....



One of our newest blends!  Connecticut (sun grown) wrapper.  Filler is Dominican and Nicaraguan ligero.  Binder is Dominican as well.  Creamy, full body, hints of nutmeg and vanilla. This Toro shape smokes cool and razor sharp.  If you like a mild cigar that's still full of flavor...give this baby a try.
